event.description: Kyle Schwarber singles on a line drive to right fielder Stephen Piscotty.
Kris Bryant strikes out swinging.
Anthony Rizzo singles on a line drive to right fielder Stephen Piscotty. Kyle Schwarber to 2nd.
Ben Zobrist grounds into a double play, second baseman Jedd Gyorko to shortstop Aledmys Diaz to first baseman Matt Carpenter. Anthony Rizzo out at 2nd.
Addison Russell strikes out swinging.
Jason Heyward strikes out swinging.

Jon Lester strikes out swinging.

Kolten Wong remains in the game as the second baseman.

Dexter Fowler walks.
Aledmys Diaz pops out to first baseman Anthony Rizzo.

Cardinals challenged (force play), call on the field was upheld: Matt Carpenter grounds into a force out, second baseman Javier Baez to shortstop Addison Russell. Dexter Fowler out at 2nd. Matt Carpenter to 1st.
